description: Allow Guest WiFi to Internet during Guest Hours
nl_query: Allow Guest_WiFi to access Internet on HTTP and HTTPS during Guest_Hours

metadata.raw_policy: Allow Guest_WiFi to access Internet on HTTP and HTTPS during Guest_Hours

expected_cli:
set rulebase security rules r1 from Guest
set rulebase security rules r1 to Untrust
set rulebase security rules r1 source Guest_WiFi
set rulebase security rules r1 destination Internet
set rulebase security rules r1 service tcp_80
set rulebase security rules r1 action allow
set rulebase security rules r1 schedule Guest_Hours

set rulebase security rules r2 from Guest
set rulebase security rules r2 to Untrust
set rulebase security rules r2 source Guest_WiFi
set rulebase security rules r2 destination Internet
set rulebase security rules r2 service application-default
set rulebase security rules r2 action allow
set rulebase security rules r2 schedule Guest_Hours

description: Allow HQ VPN Gateway to Branch Office LAN
nl_query: Allow HQ_VPN_Gateway to access Branch_Office_LAN on any protocol

metadata.raw_policy: Allow HQ_VPN_Gateway to access Branch_Office_LAN on any protocol

expected_cli:
set rulebase security rules r1 from VPN
set rulebase security rules r1 to Trust
set rulebase security rules r1 source HQ_VPN_Gateway
set rulebase security rules r1 destination Branch_Office_LAN
set rulebase security rules r1 service application-default
set rulebase security rules r1 action allow
